title: Remove custom domain configuration and use default Caffeine URL only

requirements.summary: Remove canonical redirect behavior tied to myrepubicnetwork.web.id and set canonical/og:url to the default Caffeine URL.
acceptanceCriteria: Opening the app on any hostname (e.g., an `*.icp0.io` gateway URL or the default Caffeine URL) does not redirect to `myrepubicnetwork.web.id`.

file_operations.description: Remove the pre-load canonical redirect script that forces `myrepubicnetwork.web.id`, and update the `<link rel='canonical'>` and Open Graph `og:url` to `https://myrepublic-tuk.caffeine.xyz`.

requirements.summary: Remove IC custom domain allowlist configuration for myrepubicnetwork.web.id.
acceptanceCriteria: The built frontend assets do not include an `/.well-known/ic-domains` file that lists `myrepubicnetwork.web.id` or `www.myrepubicnetwork.web.id`.
No project configuration remains that explicitly enables serving `myrepubicnetwork.web.id` via the IC gateway.

file_operations.description: Delete the IC custom domain allowlist file so it no longer enables `myrepubicnetwork.web.id` (or `www.myrepubicnetwork.web.id`) to be served by the frontend canister.

requirements.summary: Remove custom-domain documentation from the repository or replace it with a default-URL-only note.
acceptanceCriteria: There is no documentation instructing users to configure or register `myrepubicnetwork.web.id` for this project.
If any replacement documentation remains, it clearly states the app is used via `https://myrepublic-tuk.caffeine.xyz` and does not include ICP gateway registration/DNS steps.

file_operations.description: Delete the custom-domain setup documentation so the repository no longer instructs users to configure or register `myrepubicnetwork.web.id`.
